title: Compiler issues error on unused instead of warnings
body:
by **per.arneng**: 
When coding I (and others) normally write some code and notice a strange
behaviour and then comment out the newly written code to get back to a
working state. It is then very annoying to have to scroll up to the head of
the file just to toggle comments of any unused imports. I think a warning
would be more suitable. This would enhance productivity to be able to
compile with warning on this instead of error.

The same issue goes for unused variables.
